title: How to Make Audio File on Computer

steps.headline: Buy a computer microphone, If you do not already have one.
If you have a desktop, plug the microphone into the jack in its rear end.
steps.description: Usually at the bottom or right of the back panel, an icon of a mic is above it.

steps.headline: Start the Sound Recorder application.
steps.description: This can be done through: Start -> (All) Programs -> Accessories -> Entertainment -> Sound Recorder.

steps.headline: Position your mouth about three or four inches away from the receiver of your microphone.
Click the Record (big red button) button on Sound Recorder, and talk.
steps.description: You cannot record sounds for more than 60 seconds at a time  to continue recording once you have reached the 60-second mark, simply click the Record button again and your recording will start right where you left off.

If you have a desktop, plug the microphone into the jack in its rear end.
